params.amounts: The amounts allocated for each index
params.indices: The indices in the Merkle tree
params.merkleProofs: The proofs for verification for each index

params.index: The index in the Merkle tree

constructor.details: Creates a vesting airdrop with a pluggable strategy

params._claimPeriodEnd: When users can no longer initialize vesting
params.trustedForwarder: The address of the trusted forwarder for ERC2771

isClaimed(uint256).details: Checks if a claim has been made for a specific index

returns._0: Whether the index has been claimed

isTrustedForwarder(address).details: Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newStrategy: The new claim strategy to use

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

trustedForwarder().details: Returns the address of the trusted forwarder.

params.to: The address to send the tokens to

batchClaim(uint256[],uint256[],bytes32[].notice: Allows users to claim multiple allocations in a single transaction

claim(uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Allows users to claim tokens based on the current vesting strategy

withdrawTokens(address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any tokens remaining in the contract
